content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
hi,how much?
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion/r/R5koM7v74e#ppTe+oZp0sjRZcdREWW5P4Bi5XtM/05wU7Jd4tuNUec=
test the file please
Hello
wait
hi，how much？
0.25 BTC all network. Wait we prepare test for you
test please
please wait
so, how about the test file?
in 15 min
Hi there.  I got a question here wish you would answer truthfully

You mentioned 0.25 coins for 'all network' before.  In fact, we have 3 branch sites taken down, with multiple networks, in one shot.

I would like to know if this 'all network' includes all 3 sites and their local networks? 
Or the 0.25 btc ransom will only decrypt networks with this chatroom ID, that I will have to pay another 0.25 or even more for other branch offices?
0.25 BTC all network and all branch
We will give you a decryption tool it is one for all ID
understood. we're already preparing the coins and surely you know how difficult it is in our region. any chance of a cheaper price?
we can give you discount 10%
well fair enough i guess. We will inform you as soon as coins are prepared.  I don't see a receiver address in the readme.txt. so i guess you will provide it later?
I give you BTC address here. When will you be ready to send?
I would say in 2-3 days. we're trying to sort out how exchange this amount of currency into btc under heavy regulation.  it is weekend here so everything is slow.
Ok, we are expecting your payment on Monday.
OK. i have informed others.

btw, any chance of getting a one-time, unique chatroom link + ID for this chat? the readme.txt was exposed to a 3rd party and I  clearly know someone else is logging on and off this chatroom occasionally.
the pdf.7z you sent before should not be given by another company. but they had the readme before so they do have the chat accesskey and ID
This is a secret chat that only you can see. A third party also comes in but they have a different chat. This chat is only available to you.

yea i know that.  but in fact only intervened this chat yesterday.  the "test please" and "how much" part wasnt replied by me. I guess you can tell by the difference in communication style.   Someone got into this chat before us and tried to sell us the decryptor lol

we had trouble in finding methods of paying btc so we did not reply anything but just watched the chat.
Then my team asked me to inquire about the 3 branch and network things  etc.

This is a hard lesson tho. My colleagues showed the readmetxt to a 3rd party company.  I was not there when the incident happened so everything came up a bit late.   That's why i asked if we could have a new unique chatroom address+ID, and delete all other links in the readme.txt so nobody will see these messages again.
In this chat no one sees these messages except me and you. I can make another separate chat if you want, but I will delete all chats after payment.

just letting you know that someone else used the same TOR link, same Key and same ID to communicate with you first. It was not me. They showed the decrypted pds file to us right after you sent it in the chat.

Download link
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion/r/aN3KetrSoq#N01VKsXg6G8/BwJUM7k9mBd7soZCgx3HCpDshCxZ75w=

oops a messge i sent was missing? i  said  it's fine if you don't create a new chat and delete old links for us.   Its just an issue between us and the 3rd party company anyway. We're still preparing and trying to make the payment happen on monday.

Deletion link
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion/delete/aN3KetrSoq/fVPesQow9zAF9KHbWW5JPxUjkQVHGKWM
This new link for new secret chat

and also ,this link:http://lockbitspyakyequybgwgwauhzqxx7ba2gh3lmlj3zyeuaknrexdzfid.onion  
it was not us too :(   we watched the chat but never replied. it was the 3rd party company tried to get the test file
I give you new link for new chat
yea i'm logging into it. i've deleted the link already
ok
Don't worry, after payment you will receive a decryptor tool and instructions
We expect payment from you today.

Okay. We also downloaded some documents from your computers, now we will publish them in the public domain. And we will start writing to your clients that your data was stolen and they will be published.
